name: Balancer Aave v3 Boosted StablePool
description: This token represents a Balancer Boosted liquidity pool which is composed of 3 other nested balancer pools. Holders earn fees from users trading in the pools, and can also deposit the LP to Balancer's gauges to earn BAL emissions. This pool contains DAI & aDAI, USDC & aUSDC, USDT & aUSDT, the pool uses Aave, a decentralized money market on Ethereum, to generate yield.
